original_text: The Lord will shout from Zion. He will make a great noise from Jerusalem. The earth and the sky will move about. But the Lord will keep his people safe. God will bless his people The Lord will shout from Zion. He will make a great noise from Jerusalem. The earth and the sky will move about. But the Lord will keep his people safe. God will bless his people The Lord will shout from Zion.
korean_text: 여호와께서 시온에서 부르짖고 예루살렘에서 목소리를 내시리니 하늘과 땅이 진동하리로다 그러나 여호와께서 그의 백성의 피난처, 이스라엘 자손의 산성이 되시리로다

sentences.original_text: The Lord will shout from Zion.
He will make a great noise from Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예루살렘에서 큰 소리를 내실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: The earth and the sky will move about.
But the Lord will keep his people safe.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주께서는 그의 백성을 안전하게 지키실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord will shout from Zion.
